title: Shaher Momani
summary: Shaher Momani is a Jordanian distinguished professor of applied mathematics and one of the top ten  scientists in the world in the field of fractional calculus according to Web of Science several times between 2009 and 2013. he was selected as one of the world's most influential scientific minds according to Thomson Reuters in 2014 and 2015.[2][3] Momani was also selected by Thomson Reuters as one of the highly cited researchers between 2014 and 2018.[4][5] Al Momani was honored by King Abdullah II Bin Al Hussein[6] among the Jordanian Stars of Science for his contributions to his field of specialization during the World Science Forum in 2017.[7]
